pr_title: Extract more strings for translation from DiscoverPage

+import { defineMessages } from 'react-intl';

+export default defineMessages({
+  duration: 'Duration',
+  filter: 'Filter',
+  numResults: `{num, number} {num, plural,

replies.bodyText: It's ICU syntax for rendering plurals common to pretty much all i18n libraries I think. We could be lazy and render 1 Results if we want, but may as well take advantage of the feature
replies.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: can someone help provide text for the empty strings here?
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:openzipkin/zipkin into more-translated-strings
